name: The Fate Of Freedom - Melon Rush
name_original: The Fate Of Freedom - Melon Rush
description:
"I am small but not my dreams" - Little Melon

Join the battle with Melons to get "Freedom of Life" from tyrant Cleavers, in this uniquely tuned Running game.


★★ Incredible Graphics & Sound ★★

- Enjoy Real Time Water Reflection.
- Stunning Environment of Vivid Colors & Effects
- Soulful & Inspiring Music.

★★ Powers you haven't seen before in any Running game ★★

- Slow down Time, to sneak from Obstacles
- Acquire the power of black to become invincible.
- Use Mega Jump, to leap great distance over your enemies.


★★ Bonus Collections Levels ★★

Experience "White Truth" and "Dark Lie". Take as many Gems as you could.


★★ Freedom Quotes ★★

Never wastes your time upon Pause or Game Over. Read some Freedom Quotes.
